sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import './singlePost.css' export default function SinglePost() { const location = useLocation(); const path = location.pathname.split("/")[2]; const [post , setPost] = useState({}) useEffect(()=> { const getPost = async () =>{ const res = await axios.get("/posts/"+ path); setPost(res.data) }; getPost(); },[path]); return (

Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet
